data.actual_result: User name is cut off in the second line of the kick button. Best solution would be to shorten very long user names.
data.expected_result: User name should be completely shown and not be cut off
data.short_description: Edit a member: Long user name not completely shown for kick button
data.steps_to_repro: - Open server settings - Go to member list - Click on any member with very long user name - Observe the kick button - Make sure you are using an iPhone (not happens with iPad)
